adHeader: #1 MEXICAN FOOD, TACO STAND ONLY $9 per person
adDetails: Hello! we are a catering company that offers high quality Mexican food, we have a taco stand that we can bring virtually anywhere, your house, work place, parks, anywhere. And dont need much space. We have variety of meats: steak, grill chicken, marinated pork(al pastor), chile verde, chile colorado, fish, shrimp. For veggetarians grilled veggies, green salad, burritod and tacos. For children quesadilllas, burritos and tacos. Our food isnt greasy like the "others". We bring utensils: forks and plates. Aguas frescas: horchata, wstermelon, cantaloupe, strawberry and jamaica. For more information call show contact info ask for Alex . Thanks!
